reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: Identify the community based organization or traditional institutions at targeted community to assure the identification of needy youths under this project, Coordinate with them (CBOs, community level structure for example women's group, child Clubs), targ eted Community, VDC and District Level governmental line agencies, CBOs and NGOs, Develop, finalize and share trainees selection criteria with all stakeholders, Collect profiles of prospective youths and conduct interview with them, Select and finalize the trainees and arrange their arrival at training center, Orient about the training and enroll them , Impart vocational training including soft skills and life skill lessons, Conduct exposure visit in related factories, workshop and working locations as per training, Provide career guidance and psychosocial counseling support, Conduct Exposure Visit and arrange OJT, Support the graduates

participating-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

Planned end date of the activity
